name: 2048 3x3 4x4 5x5 + Blind
description:
The goal of the game is to merge numbers to get to 512, or 2048, or 8192!

There are three board sizes of 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, each has a different target number.

There are two game modes of Classic Mode and Blind Mode.

In the Blind Mode, only the highest level is visible! Therefore, it is more challenging.

The operation is simple. Just swipe the screen! Same numbers or Mahjong tiles on the swiping direction will be merged automatically.

Wish you enjoy it.
